design.title: Elegant Design
design.description: Clean and intuitive interface design keeps your attention on what really matters. Supports both light and dark modes, perfectly adapting to your usage habits.

timeManagement.title: Flexible Time Management
timeManagement.description: Based on the Pomodoro technique, with customizable work and break durations. Smart break reminders help you maintain optimal working conditions.

dataTracking.title: Data Tracking
dataTracking.description: Track your focus time and gain insights into your productivity through data visualization. Supports multiple statistical dimensions to help you improve.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Thank you for using FlowArc. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

infoCollection.title: Information Collection
infoCollection.description: We only collect information necessary for app functionality:
items: App settings: including preferences like Pomodoro duration and break time
Task data: to-do items and completion records you create
Usage statistics: focus time and other statistical data

dataStorage.title: Data Storage & Encryption
dataStorage.description: All data is stored locally on your device and will not be uploaded to any server. To protect your data security:
items: All local data is encrypted using AES-256
Encryption keys are securely stored in the system keychain
iCloud sync is currently not supported
You can delete all data at any time by removing the app

notification.title: Notification Permissions
notification.description: We request notification permissions to remind you when a Pomodoro session ends. You can modify this permission in system settings at any time.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We take the following technical measures to protect your data:
items: All data is stored locally on your device
No personally identifiable information is collected
No data is shared with third parties
No user tracking of any kind

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion
dataDeletion.description: You can delete your data in the following ways:
items: Delete individual tasks or records within the app
Uninstalling the app will automatically delete all local data
Resetting app settings will clear all preferences

policyUpdate.title: Policy Updates
policyUpdate.description: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Updated policies will be posted on this page and notified when the app is updated.
